statements: SELECT * FROM student_grades;
SELECT student_id, grade, assignment_name FROM student_grades WHERE grade >= 80;
SELECT assignment_name, student_id, grade FROM student_grades ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT * FROM student_grades WHERE grade < 70 ORDER BY student_id ASC;
SELECT MAX(grade) AS highest_grade, MIN(grade) AS lowest_grade FROM student_grades;
SELECT * FROM student_grades WHERE grade >= 90
SELECT assignment_name, grade FROM student_grades WHERE student_id = 101 ORDER BY grade DESC
SELECT * FROM student_grades WHERE student_id = 202 ORDER BY assignment_name ASC
SELECT DISTINCT student_id FROM student_grades WHERE grade < 70
SELECT MAX(grade) AS max_grade, MIN(grade) AS min_grade FROM student_grades
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT student_name, assignment_name, assignment_score FROM Students INNER JOIN Assignments ON Students.student_id = Assignments.student_id;
SELECT student_name, assignment_name, assignment_score FROM Students INNER JOIN Assignments ON Students.student_id = Assignments.student_id WHERE assignment_score > 80;
SELECT assignment_name, AVG(assignment_score) AS average_score FROM Assignments GROUP BY assignment_name;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students WHERE grade > 80 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, grade FROM Students WHERE student_id = 3;
SELECT student_name, assignment_name, assignment_score FROM Students s JOIN Assignments a ON s.student_id = a.student_id WHERE assignment_score BETWEEN 70 AND 90 ORDER BY assignment_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE grade < 70 AND student_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT student_id, COUNT(assignment_id) AS num_of_assignments FROM Assignments GROUP BY student_id HAVING num_of_assignments > 5 ORDER BY num_of_assignments DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM students WHERE student_grade >= 90;
SELECT assignment_name, assignment_due_date, assignment_grade FROM assignments ORDER BY assignment_due_date DESC;

SELECT student_name, assignment_name, assignment_grade FROM students INNER JOIN student_assignments ON students.student_id = student_assignments.student_id INNER JOIN assignments ON student_assignments.assignment_id = assignments.assignment_id;
SELECT MAX(assignment_grade) AS highest_grade FROM assignments;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM students WHERE student_grade > 90;
SELECT student_name, assignment_name, assignment_due_date FROM students s JOIN student_assignments sa ON s.student_id = sa.student_id JOIN assignments a ON sa.assignment_id = a.assignment_id;
SELECT DISTINCT student_name FROM students WHERE student_grade IS NOT NULL;
SELECT AVG(student_grade) AS average_grade FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students;
SELECT assignment_name, total_marks, due_date FROM Assignments;
SELECT student_id, assignment_id, marks_obtained FROM Grades WHERE marks_obtained > 80;
SELECT student_id, overall_grade, total_marks_obtained FROM Performance ORDER BY total_marks_obtained DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students JOIN Performance ON Students.student_id = Performance.student_id;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students;
SELECT assignment_name, total_marks, due_date FROM Assignments WHERE total_marks > 50;
SELECT student_name, assignment_name, marks_obtained FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id JOIN Assignments ON Grades.assignment_id = Assignments.assignment_id;
SELECT student_name, overall_grade, total_marks_obtained FROM Students JOIN Performance ON Students.student_id = Performance.student_id WHERE overall_grade = 'A';

SELECT Students.student_name, Assignments.assignment_name, Grades.marks_obtained FROM Students, Assignments, Grades WHERE Students.student_id = Grades.student_id AND Assignments.assignment_id = Grades.assignment_id;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM courses WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT assignment_id, assignment_name, deadline FROM assignments WHERE deadline < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY deadline ASC;
SELECT student_id, grade FROM grades WHERE grade >= 80;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_id = '01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef';
SELECT assignment_name, deadline FROM assignments ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM students JOIN course_registration ON students.student_id = course_registration.student_id JOIN courses ON course_registration.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT AVG(grade) AS average_grade, student_name FROM grades JOIN students ON grades.student_id = students.student_id GROUP BY student_name ORDER BY average_grade DESC;
